data.enText: an act or event that does not follow the laws of nature and is believed to be caused by God
a lucky thing that happens that you did not expect or think was possible

data.chText: 撞车事故中竟然没有一人丧生，这真是奇迹。
data.enText: It's a miracle (that) nobody was killed in the crash.

data.chText: 让这个公司赢利简直是天方夜谭。
data.enText: It would take a miracle to make this business profitable.

data.chText: 有奇效的疗法；灵丹妙药

data.enText: a very good example or product of sth

data.chText: 这辆车是汽车工业的精品。
data.enText: The car is a miracle of engineering.

data.chText: 她的健身计划对她很有效。
data.enText: Her exercise programme has worked miracles for her.

simple_means.memory_skill: mir 惊奇 + acle 物和抽象的概念 → 让人惊奇的东西 → 奇迹

ex.chText: 他们赶上了火车，这真是个奇迹。
ex.enText: It was a miracle that they managed to catch the train.
That old man believes in miracles.

synonyms.bx: 指未预料到的或认为不太可能发生的幸运之事，也可指神创造的奇迹。

ex.chText: 他90岁高龄了还在继续自己的研究工作，他绝对是个了不起的人！
ex.enText: He continued to work on his research as he reached the age of 90 - he was an absolute marvel!

ex.chText: 人们认为这些是现代科学的奇迹。
ex.enText: People believe that these are the marvels of modern science.

synonyms.bx: 指令人惊异的人或事物，含极为有用或灵巧之意。

ex.enText: What are the eight wonders/marvels of the world?

ex.chText: 你认为哪些是十大科技奇迹？
ex.enText: According to you, what are the top 10 technological wonders/marvels?

ex.chText: 科罗拉多大峡谷是世界自然奇观之一。
ex.enText: The Grand Canyon is one of the natural wonders/marvels of the world.

synonyms.bx: 指令人惊异、赞叹的事物，包括自然奇观和人创造的奇迹，作此义解时可与 marvel 换用。

data.chText: 她的健身计划对她很有效。
data.enText: Her exercise programme has worked miracles for her.

tr: a marvellous event manifesting a supernatural act of a divine agent

value.def: If you say that a good event is a miracle, you mean that it is very surprising and unexpected.

example.ex: It is a miracle no one was killed...
example.tran: 出人意料的是，没有人死亡。

example.ex: The Italian economic miracle has always been a mystery...
example.tran: 意大利的经济奇迹一直是个谜。

value.def: A miracle drug or product does something that was thought almost impossible.

example.ex: ...a miracle drug that is said to be a cure for Aids and cancer.
example.tran: 据说可以治愈艾滋病和癌症的神药

value.tran: (药物或产品)神奇的，不可思议的

value.def: A miracle is a wonderful and surprising event that is believed to be caused by God.

partsOfSpeech.dec: ad 加强 + mir 惊奇；看 + e → 很惊奇地看 → 羡慕
mir 惊奇；看 + acle 表物 → 让人惊奇的东西 → 奇迹
mirac〔le〕奇迹 + ulous …的 → 奇迹般的
mir 惊奇；看 + age 表名词 → 让人惊奇 → 奇景
mirr 惊奇；看 + or 表器物 → 能看见自己的东西 → 镜子
mir 惊奇；看 + th 表状态 → 惊喜的状态 → 欢乐

rootsaffixes.indicate: 表名词，“物和抽象的概念”
rootsaffixes.title: -acle

partsOfSpeech.dec: man 手 + acle 物和抽象的概念 → 手上的东西 → 手铐
mir 惊奇 + acle 物和抽象的概念 → 让人惊奇的东西 → 奇迹
ob 逆 + sta 站 + acle 物和抽象的概念 → 反着站的东西 → 障碍
pinn 尖 + acle 物和抽象的概念 → 尖的东西 → 尖塔
re 一再 + cept 拿，抓 + acle 物和抽象的概念 → 装了可以再装 → 容器
spect 看 + acle 物和抽象的概念 → 仿佛看到幻觉 → 奇观
tent 伸展 + acle 物和抽象的概念 → 伸展出去探 → 触角
